incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : A workaround consisting in one tier 1 partner isolation on our peering points in Paris (GSW & TH2) was applied at 10:14 UTC. There has been no further service disruption since then. Ongoing Actions : We are still investigating the exact root cause. The workaround is being closely monitored to ensure long-term stability. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Backbone offering, which is causing temporary issue in Switzerland region Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 07/08/2025 11:30 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some OVHCloud services might be unreachable using Swisscom provider. Customers Impact : Some of our customers located in Switzerland reaching OVHCloud hosted services via the Swisscom provider may experience service disruption. Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Public Network service. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 11/08/2025 23:30 UTC End time : 12/08/2025 01:30 UTC Service impact : Public network will be temporarily unavailable for some servers located in room G125. Network disruption might also be observed. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment . Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 12/08/2025 04:00 UTC End time : 12/08/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 13/08/2025 09:50 UTC End time : 13/08/2025 10:50 UTC Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 30 minutes. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance. From 09:50 UTC to 10:50 UTC, the maintenance may temporarily affect availability of servers Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS4 are: T04A, T04B and T04C Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS5 are: T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS5 are: T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are: B702, B703, B707, B709, B710 and B716 Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.
